actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish an energy stamp program to provide energy stamps to low-income householders to help meet the cost of rising fuel bills.

summary.text: Establishes an energy stamp program to provide up to twenty-five dollars worth of energy stamps per month to low-income households to help meet fuel costs incurred by such households. Provides that participation in this program shall be limited to households with an annual income of less than $6,500 (as determined by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare).

titles.title: A bill to establish an energy stamp program to provide energy stamps to low-income householders to help meet the cost of rising fuel bills.
